verses.text: \w My|strong="H1732"\w* heart \w is|strong="H1732"\w* steadfast, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w my|strong="H1732"\w* heart \w is|strong="H1732"\w* steadfast. I \w would|strong="H1732"\w* \w sing|strong="H7892"\w*, I \w would|strong="H1732"\w* make \w music|strong="H7892"\w*; awake, \w my|strong="H1732"\w* soul.
Awake, harp \w and|strong="H3820"\w* lyre; \w I|strong="H3559"\w* would wake \w the|strong="H3559"\w* dawn.
\w I|strong="H5782"\w* would praise you among \w the|strong="H5782"\w* peoples, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*; make music among \w the|strong="H5782"\w* nations \w to|strong="H5782"\w* you.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* great \w to|strong="H3068"\w* heaven \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* love, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* faithfulness \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* clouds.

\w Be|strong="H8064"\w* exalted, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w*, \w o|strong="H3068"\w*’er \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* glory \w o|strong="H3068"\w*’er \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* love \w may|strong="H3519"\w* \w be|strong="H8064"\w* rescued, save \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* right hand \w and|strong="H8064"\w* answer \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.

God \w did|strong="H3225"\w* solemnly swear: “\w As|strong="H3225"\w* victor \w will|strong="H4616"\w* I divide Shechem, portion \w out|strong="H2502"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* valley \w of|strong="H3225"\w* Succoth.

\w Mine|strong="H1696"\w* \w is|strong="H1696"\w* Gilead, \w mine|strong="H1696"\w* \w is|strong="H1696"\w* Manasseh, Ephraim \w is|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* helmet, Judah \w my|strong="H1696"\w* sceptre \w of|strong="H6010"\w* rule,

Moab \w the|strong="H4519"\w* pot \w that|strong="H3063"\w* I wash \w in|strong="H3063"\w*, \w on|strong="H7218"\w* Edom I hurl my sandal, I shout \w o|strong="H3068"\w*’er Philistia \w in|strong="H3063"\w* triumph.”

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H5275"\w* brought \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fortified city! \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H5275"\w* led \w into|strong="H5921"\w* Edom!

\w Have|strong="H5892"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w not|strong="H5892"\w* spurned us, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H4310"\w*? \w You|strong="H5704"\w* \w do|strong="H4310"\w* \w not|strong="H5892"\w* march \w forth|strong="H2986"\w* \w with|strong="H5892"\w* our armies.
Grant \w us|strong="H2186"\w* help \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* foe, \w for|strong="H6635"\w* human help \w is|strong="H6635"\w* \w worthless|strong="H3808"\w*.
With God \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H6862"\w* yet do bravely, he himself \w will|strong="H6862"\w* tread down our \w foes|strong="H6862"\w*.
